name: North Indian
description: Rich and diverse, North Indian cuisine is known for its use of dairy products and spices.

name: South Indian
description: Famous for its rice-based dishes and unique flavors, South Indian cuisine is a must-try.

name: East Indian
description: Known for its seafood and sweets, East Indian cuisine offers a variety of flavors.

name: West Indian
description: Spicy and vibrant, West Indian cuisine is famous for its curries and street food.
